author: {'steamid': '76561198176743546', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 7688, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1195, 'last_played': 1486229336}
review:
"Noire"
1 word that simply baited me to buy this game

K, let's review this game
Pros :
+ Noire best CPU as the lead? Can't ask for more
+ Some refreshing Table Turn Based RPG in Neptunia franchise
+ Quite Challenging if you play with Hard difficulty and without ultimate gear
+ Some new Refreshing RPG-ish BGMs and RPG-ish places
+ A lot of characters (that means a lot of grinding)
Cons :
- 30 fps (honestly It didn't bother me that much)
- Music not looping properly. Now this is bother me so much
- Achievement not popping in game (It will popped out after you quit the game)
- Auto Dialog system  just skip to next dialog if there's no voice. I always play with Auto so this bother me too.
- Oh yeah, I forgot about the faceless secretary guy. Ugh I don't like him, typical guy

Well, I can't say this is a Great game, but I can say this is a good game (especially when there's Noire in the title). 
If you enjoy Neptunia franchise and love Noire and don't mind a bit of bug here and there, I recommend this game for you.
But if you butthurt about everything wrong with this game, well just do what you want.

author: {'steamid': '76561198218764327', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1464803315}
review:
Итак, что мы имеем:

----------------------------------------

Очередная игрушка серии H. Neptunia, в которой главная героиня (как все уже поняли, ага) совсем не всеми полюбившаяся Неп-Чан.
Простенькие и легонькие шуточи, отсылки к другим играм, захватывающая история - вот идеальная формула создания хорошего игрового сюжета, и я, отнюдь, готов поспорить с теми людьми, кто говорит, что в играх серии Neptune нет сюжета. (!)
В этот раз мы оказываемся в новом мире под названием: "Gamemarket", за который, вновь, идёт война между богинями, но вот незадача, наши 3 любимые богиньки объединились против Ноар! В результате чего, как ни странно, проигрывают.. Позже мы встречаем всеми запомнившуюся Airfore, представившуюся милой девушкой Eno, которая обманывает Ноар и похищает Sharicite...Неплохо, да? - далее сюжет стоит умолчать, иначе это будет большууууущиииий спойлер, вот.

Жанр игры - стратегия. Игра нас может порадовать не только замысловатыми локациями, но и обширным выбором персонажей. Стоит отметить, что в версии Ноар на ps vita платных персонажей намного больше, чем тут!  Порой игроку надо придумывать различные комбинации построения героинь и тактику.  Однако, все же, в Ноар намного интереснее играть на vita, имхо.

Многих пугает цена DLC Bundle. Так вот, друзья. Не надо платить такую кучу денег! Достаточно купить 4 последних DLC ( 3 героя + фулл ивенты ) и цена вместе с игрой у вас выйдет примерно в 550 руб. ( а ведь один DLC Bundle стоит 600 с лишним рублей ). Если вы хотите купить Ultimate set(-ы) на героинь и потратить деньги за зря, чтобы ОТБИТЬ весь интерес к игре ( ибо игра становится ужасно легкой ) - дело ваше.

У многих также случался баг с черным экраном после прохождения 2-х начальных строк диалога перед видео. Мне помогло удаление кодеков ( не всех, а именно Sam Codec ), после чего всё заработало.

Итог:

IF&Compile Hearts не перестают радовать игроков своими играми, пока не привычними для многих людей, но не менее интересными!  Если вы ищете чего-нибудь новенького и любите аниме - игра Idea Factory International и CompileHearts - то, что вам нужно. 

Имхо.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000777924', 'num_games_owned': 1287, 'num_reviews': 193, 'playtime_forever': 1076, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1016, 'last_played': 1462364046}
review:
I bought every previously released on PC Nep-Nep game. Love main series a lot! Love even slice and dice one. But this one... no. Just no.

Mechanically mostly it's fine. It has neat combat, good scenarios for that combat. But weird thing #1 in here is that in order to activate hdd u need to perform skills while standing near other character. That char kisses you and it adds some points into lily. Activating HDD cost 30 and it lasts only 3 turns... this in my opinion is very weird alteration. I'm also replaying Nep-Nep game with my favourite character - Plutia. And considering that activating hdd in there does not sorta... forces you to rush and you can just enjoy your anime-power-up - this change to good 'ol formula in Noire game seems very weird to me.

However this is not the main reason why I dropped the game and do not recomment it to Nep-Nep fans. The main reason is how Noire is in the game and what she's doing. This could be somewhat spoilery, but I'll try to cover only her motivation and formulaic approach to stuff. Basically Noire wants to conquer everything. Yeah... Noire is now despot and wants to conquer all and is ready to beat and destroy everything which stands in her way. Formula to events - we see some characters who are powerful and could be good addition to Noire army. Noire just... beats them, adds to her roster, captures country/city and move to next one.

This... no. Just no. I play in Nep-Nep to enjoy humour, parody, references, colorful cast. And character who was established in like 4 games or so, suddenly wants to conquer everything and acts like a male baby making organ... no. Most of battles I'm seriously cheering for me to fail the combat.

หัวดำ จงเจริญ !! ยอมเจียดเวลาอันน้อยนิดมาเล่นเลย แถมไม่หนักเครื่องอีก
ส่วนตัวละครก็เรียกได้ว่าถูกใจ เพราะย่อส่วนให้เล็กลงมา
เรียกว่า ห้ามพลาดเลยครับพี่น้อง !! ควรค่าแก่การสอย ฝุดๆ

ปล.ส่วนใครเน้นหื่น ตีม่อนแล้วเสื้อผ้าขาด แนะนำภาค U ครับ (รอ 60% ค่อยสอย ไม่รีบ เพราะภาค Noire น่าสนใจกว่า)
(ซีรี่ย์นี้ประกอบด้วย : Rebirth1  Rebirth2  Rebirth3 ภาคU ภาคNoire เรียงตามนี้เลยครับ)

author: {'steamid': '76561198174657626', 'num_games_owned': 388, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 5846, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1805, 'last_played': 1467439819}
review:
Idea Factory has yet released another installment for the Neptunia franchise on Steam for PC players to enjoy!
This time around, it's another spinoff surrounding by our CPU of Lastation, Noire! (Or... Black Heart if you prefer that)

Being a spinoff from the main Re;birth games. This time around we are leaving the world of RPG to a SRPG styled gameplay with our beloved and soon to be beloved characters chibi-fied! That's right, all those chibi artworks you may have seen floating around the net as pictures or merch created by Tsunako-san shall now come to life and ready for action. 
Also to note, this takes in the world of Gamarket (See what they did there, so punny! (....*walks away* I know, that was lame... xD))

In regards to gameplay, it's slower than your usual battles from the main game. When your characters move they have  a specific range in which you can select to move to. Items and activating HDD is same as ever. There are no maps. Like, Neptunia U. The story proceeds through doing quests! But not to worry, our hidden boxes and items are stillin the game but in battle as treasure chests... :3
Lily Ranks are now triggered using SP Skills and Moves if characters are adjacent to each other. I find that a nice touch because this means you can rank up more than 1 time in battle.

Some additional info, this is the first time I've encountered a Neptunia crash when opening the game (I was quite surprised since I own all the games and never experienced it). For those who are having trouble, I'd like to share how I resolved this. Set the game as an Administrator and run Windows 8 Compatibility Mode. It works for me and I have Windows 8.1 (Yes, I haven't upgraded lol). So yeah! Hopefully this trick will work for others too :))

author: {'steamid': '76561198019708142', 'num_games_owned': 804, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1517908624}
review:
As far as I played,  I had 4 crashes to desktop within the 104 Minutes of playing the game, while selecting Disc jockey in town. Wait for patches, this is too unstable. 

System: Windows 7 pro 64 bit.

Additionally with DLC hell. They decided to sell us all DLC extra this time. But it seems, that this are mostly "hats".

Locked to 30 fps. But this isn't really an issue, because it's a tactical JRPG. So it doesn't matter much. This is one of the games, that does not need more than 30 fps.

The player character idea is just terrible, Like the "strategist" in fire emblem, who is never visible on the battlefield. And I don't like the conversations around him very much. It feels forced.

I'll change my review, if they fix the crashes.

Otherwise this is a game with Noire as main character. What is not to like about that. ;) I am not able to say more about the game, after the short time I played so far. but I will insert the positive aspects here, too, after a time.


----------------------

As  said before, my main issue are the CTD. That is unforgiving. With the other aspects I am able to live.

I week has gone by, no message from the developers. I will ask for a refund, buying the game later, if fixed, for 5 Euro in a sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006247927', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 6951, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3665, 'last_played': 1701205881}
review:
Having spent well over 50hrs on the game I'm giving it a positive. Its a good spin-off from the Neptunia series and is well exacuted. Giving Noire the main helm. Nice turn-based stragety with characters turning into miniture counterparts. Almost like Nendoroids if you own any. You are also self-inserted into the game as Noire's Secretary.


+ Noire as main character
+ Loads of characters and new ones. All based off some other character/console or game
+ Pleasent OST
+ Customizabled add-ons, weapons and items
+ Sim-Noire. Help her decide on requests from her citizens and housework
+ Good animations & Special Moves
+ 4K support (suprisingly)
+ Good voice acting from Japanese


- Poor English voice cast. Not in sync with animations
- Quite a grind-fest
- Occasional CTD
- Secretary (you) 
- AI doesnt attack you unless in move tiles
- Not enough enviroment interaction

author: {'steamid': '76561198014241202', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1461964974}
review:
As much as it pains me, as a Hyperdimension Neptunia fan, owning all the Nep games on steam, the beggining of this game alone made me lose all interest in playing it through. At least I was able to finish Re;Birth 2. The reason for this is a personal preference, at for other people this might be no problem, so unless you share the feeling you might actually like this game.

Basically, it's the "Player" thing. One thing is having to play as a protagonist character with a defined personality and behavior. You might agree more or less with the character, but it's someone else, in the end. But not in here. Noire is kind of the protagonist, sure, but "your character" is there. A faceless, voiceless character names "Player", who is male, and represents you. And whenever he talks it means he's putting words in your mouth. And I don't like the words he puts in my mouth.

The Hyperdimension Neptunia franchise's cast is composed by 99% female characters. Buuuuut you get to be represented as a male one. Why? Obviously for the simDate effect. Forced to have a generic male simDate character as your avatar in the game to appeal to the target audience of the game, I guess.

In my opinion, to make it more like a Neptunia game and not just a Nep-themed simDate, I'd have placed another female character who drops videogame references like everyone else. It'd make one feel more inmersed withing the setting if one's character is simmilar to the rest.

Anyway, as I said first, this is a personal preference, and other players might not be bothered at all by this, but it does bother me a lot. I guess this will be the only Nep game I won't finish.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089719552', 'num_games_owned': 573, 'num_reviews': 215, 'playtime_forever': 3082, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1144, 'last_played': 1584029883}
review:
Ya llevo varias horas, por lo que creo que puedo hacer un decente analisis. Quiza lo cambie conforme avanze en el juego.

Volvemos al universo de Nep-Nep y compañia, pero esta vez vamos a una tierra totalmente distinta. Ahora estamos en una unica isla en vez de en varias, pero las ciudades principales y sus diosas no cambian. La historia, en cambio, si: ahora controlamos a Noire, y ahora son las otras 3 diosas las que se unen contra ella en un principio, y deben acabar uniendo fuerzas para recuperar su poder misteriosamente perdido.

Los shares cambian drasticamente: antes habian 5 barras, una para cada diosa y otra para el enemigo, pero aqui solo hay una barra, la que determina cuantos shares tienen recuperado las diosas del enemigo.

El combate tambien cambia drasticamente: los personajes en combate son representados con chibis, el campo de batalla es una cuadricula y el posicionamiento y la orientacion de los personajes cobra una importancia tactica. Pero el resto del combate no cambia, incluida la posibilidad de que las CPUs puedan usar su HDD.

Otra cosa que puedes hacer en este juego, es comprar muebles y mejorar la habitacion de Noire, de forma que sea mas de su estilo, ademas de asistirla en algunas de sus obligaciones como CPU.

review: Idea Factory, you were the chosen one! It was said that you would destroy the EA-esque DLC rehashing, not join them... bring balance to the games industry, not leave it in DLC-bloated stagnation! You were my sister Idea Factory, and I loved you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129438505', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 483, 'last_played': 1471686591}
review:
Nep-Nep is back Bitches!!! 
Um nochmal unsere Frühlings/Kawaii/Moe Gefühle zu wecken beglückt Idea Factory uns mal weder mit einem neuen Hyperdimension Neptunia.....oh ne Moment mal Hyperdivotion Noire?? Ja genau hier handelt es sich um ein Spinoff der Original Spiel Reihe in dem unsere allseits geliebte Tsundere Noire die Hauptfigur spielt. Jap Nep, die Entwickler haben dich diesmal hinten angestellt. Zur Story werd ich nicht viel sagen, die ist wie in allen Teilen mal wieder sehr gut gelungen, und man solte sie einfach genießen. Es gibt viele neue Charaktere und auch unsere alten Bekannten sind wieder dabei, allerdings fehlen, was ich sehr schade finde, die Schwestern der CPUS aus Teil 2. Dialoge sind mal wieder sehr gut gelungen und es sind haufenweise Anspielungen auf andere Teile der Reihe, aber auch auf komplett andere Sachen eingebaut. Übrigends spielt das Spiel in einer alternativen Welt und nicht dem Gameindustri das wir aus Re;Birth kennen. Aber genug davon kommen wir zum eigentlichen Spiel. Grafiktechnisch hat sich das Spiel etwas verbessert und sieht nicht schlechter oder besser aus als man erwarten würde. Was allerdings ein kleiner Kritikpunkt ist, wäre der 30 FPS Lock der vorhanden ist. Hier muss man selbst entscheiden, in wie weit das stört. Ich finds nicht gravierend, da meiner Meinung nach 60 FPS nur bei Shootern Pflicht sind. Tja dann wäre da noch das Gameplay. Wer gut aufgepasst hat, dem wird aufgefallen sein, das es sich hier mehr um ein Strategie/Taktik Spiel handelt. Das Kampfsystem ist sehr an RE;Birth angelehnt, unterscheidet sich aber doch stark dahingegend das gerade Reichweite von Angriffen oder Items begrenzt sind. Für mich war es doch eine Umstellung so das ich doch mal des öfteren gefailt habe da ich meine Einheiten ungünstig platziert habe und somit Buffs/Heilung nicht möglich war. Man kommt aber relativ schnell rein und auserdem ist auch alles extrem detailiert und übersichtlich erklärt sodass keine Fragen bleiben. Zumindest liegt mir das Kampfsystem besser als das von U. Erwähnenswert ist auch, dass es hier nicht mehr die Dungeons gibt, die man aus Re;Birth kennt, sondern jede Mission hat ein eigenes Mini-Dungeon Spielfeld auf dem dann auch LootKisten stehen. Ansonsten bietet das Spiel alles, was man schon kennt, Items craften geht immer noch über Pläne, man kann mit Leuten aus der Umwelt agieren, und es gibt wieder Events, welche sich diesmal logischerweise um Noire drehen. Das Lili Rank System ist ebenfalls wieder vorhanden, allerdings funktoiniert es diesmal etwas anders. Ich sage nur das die Umsetzung sehr........Interessant gehalten ist. Probierts einfach aus, ihr werdet sehen was ich meine. 
So zuletzt muss ich noch einen Punkt ansprechen, den wieder jeder subjektiv bewerten wird. Ich sage nur "Sekretär". "Was soll n das jez heißen?" fragt ihr euch bestimmt. Tjaaaa relativ bald nach Spielbeginn wird man selbst in das SPiel gebracht. Jup der Spieler selbst ist im Spiel als Caarakter eingebaut, und ihr werdet als sodann nach einer aufmunternden Rede und etwas Shares verteilen zu Noires persönlichem Sekretär ernannt. Wobei ich die Idee eigentlich ganz cool und echt witzig finde, so hat es doch einen bitteren Beigeschmack. So ist der "Spieler" oder ich nenn in auch Sekretär eigentlich zu nichts da als Gespräche zu führen und den Plot etwas voranzubringen. Man kann nicht mit ihm kämpfen, was aber auch daran liegen könnte das er viel zu nutzlos ist und sich lieber K.O schlagen lässt, aber egal. Auch ist von selbst die Möglichkeit zur Interaktion als Figur in dieser Welt nicht gegeben, wodurch dieses Gefühl, dass man selbst im Spiel ist und seinen Lieblingscharakteren persönlich nahe ist, doch etwas einschränkt. Zwar gibt es eine Art Minispiel namens SIM Noire, wo man für Noire Anfragen der Bürger beantworten kann, was aber auch nicht mehr wirklich viel rausreißt. Letzlich finde ich die Idee aber interessant, allerdings hätte man da schon einiges mehr draus machen können.
Wie siehts also letztendlich aus?
Ich muss sagen mir gefällt das Spiel sehr gut, zwar muss man sich etwas in das Kampfsystem einarbeiten, besonders wenn man so etwas so wie ich nicht so oft spielt, allerdings kann man sich relativ schnell einfinden. Story, Charaktere sind großartig wie eigentlich immer. Grafik und Aufmachung ist halt Geschmackssache ob einem der Chibbi Style des Spiels liegt oder nicht. Das einzig Negative ist in meinen Augen der 30 FPS Lock und das das Spiel doch so hier und da mal abschmiert wobei zumindest letzteres sicher noch gefixt wird und vielleicht kommt auch für ersteres eine Lösung. Ich würde das Spiel jedem ans Herz legen, der auf Strategie steht oder schon Spaß an den anderen Teilen der Reihe hatte. Für eine Sale Preis von ca. 17 Euro ist das auch ein echt guter Preis und sollte man doch keinen Gefallen daran finden kann man es ja bei unter 2 Stunden Spielzeit wieder umtauschen.
Also würd ich mal sagen "Lets Nep-Nep"

PS Ach ja da dies ja ein Spiel über und mit Noire als Hauptfigur ist wollte ich noch sagen "E-Es ist nicht so das ich dieses Review geschrieben hab, um euch einen Überblick über das Spiel zu geben oder euch bei eurer Kaufüberlegung zu helfen...nein es war reiner Zufall......BAKA!!!!"

author: {'steamid': '76561197970342369', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 1228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 969, 'last_played': 1462312777}
review:
Much like Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed, this is another spin-off of the Hyperdimension Neptunia series. This time, they went full on SRPG, grid and all. 

If you've played the main entries in the series (if not, I'll sum it up at the bottom), a lot of the staples are here. There's item plans to craft, discs to burn, and a bunch of processor equipment you won't ever bother using. Oh, there's also still a ton of anime boobs, so if that's your thing, no need to worry about that being left out. 

Gameplay is pretty similar to other SRPGs you might have played, such as Final Fantasy Tactics or Disgaea. As mentioned before, the playing field is on a grid. Turns are divided into a player phase and an enemy phase, instead of rotating through all active combatants based on speed. You can activate HDD mode on the characters to give them boosts. This can only be used once per character per fight, lasts 3 turns, and makes a huge difference if used correctly. Some characters, like Noire, get extra bonuses in this form as well. She can act twice per turn in HDD form, for instance.

The world map is very similar to the main games, where you just pick different icons on a map (or a list, if you want) for things like the shop, making plans, and the like. There's an option for the missions as well, so don't think you're going to wander around a map and get in fights like in Final Fantasy Tactics. It's much similar to Disgaea in this regard. There are story missions as well as side missions, and you can replay the story missions in a simulation mode. This allows you to use any characters you'd like for the missions instead of who was required in the story, and gives you different rewards for completion of the mission as well.

Experience is awarded per action instead of per kill, similar to most SRPGs. You will usually get a tiny bit more for a kill, but any valid action other than moving will earn you something. This makes it worth your while to spam super weak healing items each turn if you don't have a real action you want to take.

The story cutscenes are the same as the main series. You'll see a lot of the same backgrounds and characters you did in those games, as well as a lot of the same enemies because everyone knows they love recycling assets at Idea Factory. I'm just saying what we're all thinking.

The lily system is here as well, but it is a bit different. Standing next to one or more characters when you use a skill will cause the nearby characters to (ugh) kiss you on the cheek, lowering the SP cost of the skill and raising your LP (Lily Points?) and possibly your lily rank. LP is reset after each battle, is one total for the whole party, and ranges from 0 to 100, raising by 20 per kiss. If you get kissed by more than one character at a time, each kiss will give less than the full 20 points, however. Still, it's not a big downside; getting kissed twice at the same time gives 30, which is fine. You can spend all 100 for a strong attack, and you need 30 to activate HDD mode.

The challenge system from Hyperdimension Neptunia 3 is back. If you're not familiar with this, it's a list of various things that when completed give some bonus to the character. Each challenge has various ranks, with the required number of the action and the bonus increasing as the rank goes up. For instance, moving a total of 25 spaces as a character will complete rank 1 of their movement challenge and award them +2 agility, if I'm not remembering incorrectly. It might not sound like much, but a lot of these are basically free stats, as you will complete a lot of these without even trying. The stat increases for the higher ranks get better as well, and they stack. Sadly, the required number of actions for the higher ranks will climb to ridiculous levels right along side the stats. You probably *will* have to try to complete the higher ranks of most challenges.

There's a new system where you earn sim points as you buy things from the shop. These points can be spent in a Noire sim mode, which is basically buying her things for her bedroom and upgrading the actual room itself. You also get requests from citizens in this mode, which function a lot like the quests in the main series, except without the actual quest. You just pick a choice from a menu to solve their request, and bingo. It's done. Picking the "correct" response can lead to getting some extra stuff, like events in the sim mode.

Good luck picking the correct responses without a guide, though. You're given a couple options for what action to take on the request, and most choices are just two words long. This doesn't really give you enough information to know what the choice is actually going to mean in the context of the request. Often times you'll get a request that is something like "I want to do a thing!" and you have a response that is "do thing." Does this mean you are telling them to do the thing? Does this mean YOU are doing the thing? Is it considered a correct reply? Who knows! Pick it and find out! Or, get a guide.

One neat thing I have to point out is that this game has an option to skip battle animations and things, or to play them at double speed. You can turn this on in the options menu, or you can leave it off and just mash the A button to skip animations at will. This is a great feature, and I'm glad to see it return in this entry in the series.

The series also brought along one of the negatives that all other entries have had, and that is a lack of video options. I know these games are ports, but I really don't like seeing PC games that don't really offer options to tweak the video. You can change the resolution, and turn off detailed shadows, but that's about it. Don't expect any options like texture quality or SSAO. On the otherhand, the game doesn't demand a beastly computer to run fine, so this most likely won't have an impact on your ability to play the game. It still makes me sad, though.

If for some reason you are totally unfamiliar with this series, just think Final Fantasy Tactics or Disgaea with more moe fan service and a meta narrative that thinks it is being super clever about the video game industry. That's basically what you get with these games. 

That all being said, they are pretty damn solid rpgs with some interesting mechanics. If you aren't totally put off by the over the top moe anime stuff and like the genre, I highly recommend them.

[If I didn't cover something you think I should have, let me know and I'll update this review.]

author: {'steamid': '76561198126597886', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1527237948}
review:
The 5th Neptunia game on steam. This time as the title suggest, Noire is the main char. This time the battle system is strategy in turns, where you need move in blocks to made your actions. 

PROS:
- CHIBIS
- If you bought all dlc, use then, they are very useful
- You are hired as Noire secretary, so u need help her. Reminds a sim game
- New characters, memes, 
- Peck your girl pals

CONS:
- The chars that you buy (e.g. Tiara, IF, Compa) arent voiced, but this isnt a great issue
- Many chars with challenges to complete

author: {'steamid': '76561198024129564', 'num_games_owned': 403, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 1779, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1114, 'last_played': 1462228662}
review:
Очередная отличная игра серии нептунии, на этот раз выступает в главной роли всеми любимая цундере Ноар :D

что можно сказать об этой игре

- Первое что бросилось мне в глаза это список персонажей (включая ДЛС их больше 20) 
- Геймплей сильно отличается от привычных игр IF, пошаговые бои на большых картах с тоннами ловушек позволяют в битве использовать до 7 персонажей одновременно
- удобная система супер атак, теперь для превращния и использование особых атак требуется lily шкала, для того чтобы ее заполнять нужно использовать скилы держась вместе с напарниками (получив крепкий поцелуй вы не только заполните lily шкалу но и снизите стоимость атаки, что очень полезно)
- Музыка, тут говорить нечего музыка тут как всегда 10/10
- Отсылки и Юмор, сдесь тоже все впорядке от ломания 4 стены до отсылок на metal gear solid и Monster hunter :D
- Сюжет тут подан очень не обычно, в начале появляется некий "Игрок" (то есть  ВЫ) персонаж без озвучки и аватара это позваляет вам вникнутся в сюжет намного сильнее.

есть пару минусов: 
ДЛС - Персонажи хороши тут все нормально но читерские предметы по 30р на каждого персонажа? серьезно? ._.
Ачивки отображаются только при выходе из игры (странный баг, но надеюсь его пофиксят)

В общем игра очень хороша, да и за 500р (300р скидкой) очень даже стоит ее опробовать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015377395', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2820, 'last_played': 1579967492}
review:
So it's finally here on Steam and it was well worth the wait.

There's too much for me to say so I'll just point out the positives and negatives.

+Same amazing voices
+Nearly all of the generals in the game showed all the references I could ever want.
+Chibi forms of the famous HDN girls are ADORABLE!
+The Noire sim section was a very nice touch and in some way heartwarming, although...

-...The last part was a little anti-climatic between the Secetary and Noire.
-This game has crashed a few times, must be a bug in the file?
-Some the missions were quite tedious, especially the zombie missions.

Overal rating 8/10 = Well worth buying, if at a discount price and if you are a fan of the HDN franchise.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162034761', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1461862582}
review:
Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart is an excellent anime-style tactical strategy sequel to the series about the adventures of the cutest goddesses from the world of Hyperdimension Neptunia, developing the story of their relationship.
The four goddesses were embroiled in an irreconcilable feud and came together in a violent struggle for power over the world. When one of them almost reached her aim, an unknown external force interfered, that also took away most of the abilities of the heroines. In Hyperdimension Neptunia the girls decide to join forces to defeat the insidious enemy, who will be fully revealed on the fields of tactical turn-based battles. Masses of spells and deadly traps, a branched out system of development of abilities of the game characters. In addition, there is also a simulation mode - the goddess, which is dedicated to this part of the game from time to time remembers the need for rest and about the arrangement of their own comfortable home. 

The game also features a dating-modeling mode with the game's main character, Lady Noir, in which you as a player become part of the story by taking on the role of a secretary. Progresses in this mode not much in the story itself, but it will give you more "extra scenes" with the goddess, which is a worthy reward in itself

What about sound? the voice-over is impressive.The soundtracks and effects are perfect for the game.

Tons of Content - Another aspect that returns to this spin-off is the amount of content, which contributes to the longevity of the game as a whole. You can grind on side quests that can help you go unlock items to be "developed" or if you're not heavily into that you can focus on the "dating simulation" part of the game with Lady Noir (furniture included).

author: {'steamid': '76561198037003719', 'num_games_owned': 4057, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 436, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 436, 'last_played': 1462003477}
review:
人氣配角取代主角成為外傳遊戲新主角的案例屢見不鮮，一直以來都在《戰機少女》系列有極高人氣的 Black Heart 聖黑之心諾瓦露終於闖出一片天，脫離配角身分在全新作品《Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart 超女神信仰諾瓦露: 激神黑心》中獨挑大樑（以下簡稱 Goddess Black Heart），取代系列作萬年主角 Purple Heart 紺紫之心涅普迪努的身分，成為貨真價實的第一女主角。就如同以往作品，《Goddess Black Heart》跟其他作品沒有任何劇情上的關聯，玩家不用先玩過其他作品就能理解人物之間的愛恨情仇，為了不要讓老玩家失去對遊戲的新鮮感，製作團隊也加入許多獨具魅力新角色供玩家解鎖。

故事劇情發生在持續千年的家機大戰，統領 Lastation 的女神諾瓦露率領旗下眾多愛將一舉進攻其他三名女神的國度，正當準備一統遊戲業界之際，心軟不願消滅好友，想要尋找不用戰鬥就能和大家共存方法的諾瓦露被一名神秘女子艾諾所欺騙，頓時之間信仰水晶失去了信仰，信仰大量流失的結果導致女神失去力量保護國家，失去女神庇護的遊戲業界也將隨之崩潰。此時由玩家所飾演的普通青年登場，千鈞一髮之際拯救即將被怪物擊敗的諾瓦露，他成為事件之後首位分享信仰給聖黑之心的人類，順利找回變身女神能力的諾瓦露，為了感謝玩家所以將你任命為 Lastation 教會秘書官，並且能與女神共同生活。


身為系列作首款回合制模擬戰略角色扮演遊戲，戰鬥系統自然轉變為敵我雙方在各自回合命令己方單位戰鬥的戰棋式玩法，戰鬥過程會根據地形高低差以及單位面向等要素進行傷害補正，舉例來說站在高處攻擊敵人己方有優勢，背部面向敵人將承受較高傷害。順帶一提，玩家在配置單位時可以選擇一名隊長角色，不同隊長角色有相對應的隊長技能，例如諾瓦露的隊長技能是增加一點行動格數但力量下降百分之十五，涅普迪努的隊長技能則是提升全隊成員的暴擊機率，因應戰局切換隊長技能可以有效提升作戰效率。

【Lily Boost】是《Goddess Black Heart》特色系統之一，當一名單位前後左右方位存在友方單位時，使用技能或是必殺技就會觸發 Lily Boost ，此時鄰近單位會親吻主單位的臉頰，除了技能威力有顯著提升以外，所須消耗的 SP 值也將下降。 Lily Boost 同時也是【Lily Point】唯一取得途徑，遊戲業界四女神消耗三十點 Lily Point 就能進行【女神變身】，變身之後單位各項能力都會大幅提升，還可以無視一切障礙飛行移動，不過女神變身有三回合時間限制，並且一場戰鬥僅能變身一次，千萬要慎選變身時機點啊！


資源有限的情況下，如何有效在短時間內蒐集合成素材？關鍵在於開啟散落在戰場四周的寶箱，擊破寶箱通常可以獲得種類豐富的素材，這些素材可以用於【道具開發】部門，只要成功研發出一種新道具，往後玩家就能在商店開啟該道具的購買權限（建議優先研發輔助道具）。《戰機少女》系列作從未缺席的【光碟燒錄】功能在《Goddess Black Heart》變成強化角色相當重要的方式，配合空白光碟與藍黃紅三色晶片的組合，可以製作出兼具防禦、輔助效果、提升戰力等多功能次要裝備供單位裝備，所幸藍黃紅三色晶片跟光碟獲取容易，大家不用擔心後期資源缺乏無法為所有角色裝備燒錄光碟。


先前提到玩家扮演的普通青年擔任教會秘書官一職，跟本次新增的全新內容【Sim Noire】有非常深層的關係，可以讓玩家在閒暇之餘拜訪諾瓦露的住處，使用商店購物取得的紅利點數【Sim Point】來換取家具裝潢，將破爛不堪的破屋改造成溫暖舒適的豪宅。除此之外我們還會收到許多 Lastation 居民的各種請求信件，由教會秘書官給予建議並透過女神付諸行動完成請求，選擇正確的話，諾瓦露對你的信賴指數會提升，進而觸發特殊事件解鎖精美 CG 插畫，選擇錯誤的話也不用灰心，這些事件不影響主線劇情發展。


《Goddess Black Heart》是一款整體表現中規中矩的回合制模擬戰略角色扮演遊戲，玩法方面沒有脫離市面上多數的同類型遊戲，僅在次要系統融入《戰機少女》特色與玩法，無論是在劇情還是新登場的人物設定，都讓系列作粉絲打從心底的感到誠意十足，不過如果你是初次接觸《戰機少女》系列作品的玩家，可能會不太喜歡作品內刻意賣萌賣肉以及沒有深度的故事劇情。總而言之，本作一如既往地將客群設定在系列作粉絲，如果你不在乎劇情深度、不要求極高的難度、不想鑽研滿是學問的系統規則，同時又打算花費許多時間在角色培育玩法上，那麼《Goddess Black Heart》將是你最佳的選擇。


優點：
+首款回合制模擬戰略角色扮演遊戲，改變玩法同時保留系列作特色玩法。
+超過二十名角色登場，光是培育角色就要耗費五十小時遊戲時數。
+百合萬歲！美少女相互親吻臉頰觸發 Lily Boost 獲得 Lily Point 強化戰力。
+扮演無臉男攻略諾瓦露，進入 Sim Noire 模式解決請求，擄獲女神芳心。


缺點：
-三頭身黏土人身材令人不太習慣，如果採用原始身長應該會更自然些。
-劇情部分缺乏引人入勝的情節，就是純粹的諾瓦露收後宮打壞人大作戰。


結論：粉絲向作品，不到不可不玩的推薦程度，算是值得一試的佳作。


網誌圖文好讀版：
http://mgrim214.blogspot.tw/2016/04/hyperdevotion-noire-goddess-black-heart.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198005253270', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 512, 'last_played': 1461813011}
review:
A new world!

A new system!

A new main character!

A present from the first character poll where Lady Black Heart won (see V-Generation for jokes), we have this offering from IF, Compa, and Sting. Thus forcing the question of if buying this game really gives that many shares to Lady Black Heart at all? I mean Iffy and Compa are clearly citizens of Planeptune....

Now, I'm sure Proper worshippers of Lady Black Heart have already played this game through more than once on their Unis, but some people probably haven't. Let's take a look at what we got going on here.

Welcome to Gamarket, another dimension in the Vast expanses of the Neptunia Multiverse. Here, Noire is pretty much in charge and controls most of the shares. However, Noire is still Noire and a certain Eggplant looking person made her fall into a trap, that not even Neptune would fall for. All hell has broken loose and the Shares in the world are in shambles, after a little bit of bickering Lady Black Heart takes charge of the other CPUs and sets to regain the shares of the world from her former 12 generals.

Joining the lovely CPUs is Noire's new Secretary. It's apparently a male, but since Males don't get faces in Neptunia we don't actually see him and it seems much of the adventure takes place from his point of view, and he may or may not get closer to his boss as the game goes on.

Pros
+An unpresidented look at Lady Noire as a character, especially for Steam Audiences.
+ Grid based Tactical battles require a little bit of thought and do make you have to different types of objectives
+ 3 difficulty modes
+ Panstu everywhere!
+ Noire's Generals are all new and represent different game franchises like Metal Gear, Street Fighter, Dragon Quest, ect and are exclusive to this game
+ The girls kiss to power each other up! The Lilly system is in OVERDRIVE

Cons
-The port is horrendus with a lot of lag spikes for apparently no reason. Those will probably get fixed if I know Iffy though.
- The CPUs are obviously different then the ones we know, and can be out of character. For example, Noire looking for informality in her employees, or Neptune genuinely getting offended when someone calls her out on her laziness.
- The Secretary (you) have some lines like "I'll lead the way... SO HARD!"
- Translation gripes that come with the territory
- Little sisters are a negative. In this day and age it's hard to imagine Noire without Uni by her side (Especially since this game is a Uni Port)
- Iffy and Compa are DLC

Neutral
| Working on the Ultradimension designs, Neptune aside, I always prefered the Hyperdimension, but that's a matter of preference.


Final thoughts

Yes, this is a Neptunia game, That implies various things about zaniness and what not, however, there is a reason why many consider this the weakest entry in the franchise. The Self-insert certainly doesn't help. The girls will be spending an almost equal amount of time making love as opposed to making war in battles because the Lilly system is ridiciously OP here. It even allows the use of our favorite EXE Drives! So, if you like the thought of that, then you should have bought this game already. The battle system is fine, nothing groundbreaking, but you'll be disappointed if you expect the greatest gameplay from Lady Neptune.

I notice how much I'm cringing as i'm going through the game, but I'm also laughing too. Just like the Conquest ending, every fan of Neptunia might as well get it over with. Just do it. 

Is this the game to get into the franchise with? Hell no!

author: {'steamid': '76561198018290036', 'num_games_owned': 703, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 732, 'last_played': 1482234458}
review: Since when did Noire have friends?

author: {'steamid': '76561198019048563', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 3971, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1243, 'last_played': 1467686621}
review:
The good

It's a good budget game
Do you want to get close to Noire? I do like that the Noire dating sim aspect does focus on one girl and your relationship with her, and it's not a harem. In fact, the leader of the harem is Noire, not you. She's the lion, and you are one of the lionesses
Story is decent. Seriously. Don't play these games for the story, maybe except Rebirth 2 and getting the conquest ending
New assets... mostly
Histoire's mission briefings. I end up really liking them
I actually have warmed up to the interactions between Player and Noire. 


The bad:

Reuse: The visual novel areas are reused
Reused music. They really need to compose more. It's not like the Final Fantasy main theme, or the battle victory theme. They overdo it
Noire doesn't seem to be the protagonist. You are. In the other games, you felt more like you were Neptune or Nepgear. In this game, you are an observer. In fact, you seem to play Player
Kind-of mixed on the Noire dating sim. 
Story is cookie-cutter. 
No Candidates :( . Even though the Candidates are often minor characters, I do like what they add to the story. 

If you like the other games, you'll probably like this one. I listed more cons than pros, but it's overall a solid game if you aren't encountering bugs

author: {'steamid': '76561198143976299', 'num_games_owned': 2103, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1492007050}
review:
没怎么看内容就买了，然后问题来了，这一堆dlc是怎么一回事? 我玩游戏到底是钩上还是不钩上啊...
打开游戏我才想起来以前玩这游戏的英文剧情我根本看不懂，于是把语音设置成日语后就在开始菜单挂了100多分钟，以后找时间再玩吧（要是能想起来的话）…
有时候想恶补一个系列却发现自己根本没时间财力和耐心，这是件很让人苦恼的事。。。。总之作为steam上的精品日呆，买就对了吧

author: {'steamid': '76561198040134610', 'num_games_owned': 737, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1463068589}
review:
[h1]Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart ภาคนี้สาวก Noire Goddess Black Heart ต้องห้ามพลาด ![/h1]

[h1]คำเตือนก่อนอ่านรีวิว[/h1]  ผมไม่ได้เป็นสาวกของ Noire Goddess Black Heart นะ แค่ชอบตัวละครนี้เฉยๆน่ะครับ ได้มาเล่นภาคนี้ ยังรู้สึกดีกับ Noire เลยครับ

Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart เป็นอีกหนึ่งภาคที่ Spin-off (ไม่ได้ต่อจากภาคไหนเลย) มาจากซีรี่ย์ Hyperdimension Neptunia โดยที่มี Noire Goddess Black Heart เป็นตัวชูโรงของภาคนี้ สำหรับใครที่ติดตามหรือรักซีรีย์ Hyperdimension Neptunia ภาคนี้เป็นอีกหนึ่งภาคที่ผมคิดว่าไม่ควรมองข้ามเลยครับ เพราะเนื้อเรื่องชวนน่าติดตามตลอดทั้งเกม ชวนให้ลุ้นว่าจะเป็นยังไงต่อไป จะไปเจอกับใครอีก แล้วต่อไปจะเป็นยังไงอีก เหมือนกับภาคก่อนๆ แต่สำหรับใครที่ไม่รู้จักซีรี่ย์นี้แล้วอยากจะมาลองสัมผัสดู ก็อาจจะมีมึนๆงงๆกับนิสัยของตัวละครแต่ละคนกันบ้างในช่วงแรกๆ แต่พอเริ่มเข้าใจและรู้ถึงนิสัยของแต่ละตัวละครก็จะรู้เองครับว่าแต่ละตัวละครนั้นมีจุดน่ารักเฉพาะตัวของแต่ละคนอยู่

Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart เกมเพลย์เป็นแบบ Strategy RPG และมีบางอย่างที่เปลี่ยนไปจากภาคก่อนๆ ครั้งแรกที่ผมได้เริ่มลองเล่นระบบการต่อสู้มันทำให้ผมนึกถึงเกม ซูเปอร์โรบ็อตไทเซ็น(Super Robot Wars) ของเครื่อง PS1 ซะเหลือเกิน เพราะการเล่นจะเป็นแบบตารางให้เดินเป็นช่องๆ (Tactical grid map) และตัวละครภาคนี้มาเป็นแบบสไตล์ Chibi ซึ่งแหวกแนวไปจากภาคก่อนๆ แล้วพวกการโจมตี ไม่ว่าจะเป็นการโจมตีแบบธรรมดาหรือใช้สกิลต่างๆ ก็จะมีรัศมีเป็นช่องๆ พอฝั่งเราไม่สามารถโจมตีหรือขยับไปที่ไหนได้หมดทุกคนก็กดจบเทิร์น แล้วต่อไปก็จะเป็นเทิร์นของฝั่งศัตรู พอฝั่งศัตรูไม่สามารถโจมตีหรือขยับไปที่ไหนได้หมดทุกตัวก็จะจบเทิร์นของศัตรู ต่อไปก็จะเป็นเทิร์นของฝั่งเรา วนไปวนมาแบบนี้จนกว่าจะผ่านเงื่อนไขของด่านได้

ระบบเกมการเล่นโดยรวมแล้ว อาจดูเข้าใจได้ยากสำหรับมือใหม่ แต่พอผ่านไปสักพัก ก็สามารถเข้าใจถึงระบบเกมได้ไม่ยากครับ พวกระบบ Lily Rank ยังคงมีอยู่เหมือนเดิม ส่วนระบบการสร้างไอเท็มต่างๆจาก Plan , การสร้าง Disc ที่เอา Chip มาประกอบใส่แผ่นก็ยังคงมีอยู่เหมือนเดิม นอกจากนี้ในระหว่างการต่อสู้ยังมีระบบ Lily Bootst ช่วยเพิ่มความแรงให้กับสกิล , Speacial Move ทั้งยังลดค่า SP/LP ในการใช้แต่ละครั้งด้วยอีกต่างหาก ระบบ HDD แปลงร่างก็ยังคงมีอยู่เหมือนเดิม แต่ภาคนี้มีเวลาจำกัดในการแปลงร่างแค่ 3 เทิร์นเท่านั้น ใช้ค่า LP ขั้นต่ำ 30

ส่วนระบบ Sim Noire จะเป็นระบบที่เกี่ยวกับตัวเอกซึ่งก็คือตัวเราเองที่เป็นเลขาของ Noire Goddess Black Heart มาช่วยอ่านจดหมายคำร้องจากคนอื่นๆที่ส่งมาให้ Noire แล้วช่วย Noire ตัดสินใจว่าควรทำยังไงดี ถ้าเลือกตอบข้อที่ถูก Noire จะไว้วางใจเรามากขึ้น ซึ่งทำให้เกิด Event พูดคุยต่างๆได้ แล้วยังได้รับไอเท็มพิเศษต่างๆด้วยอีกต่างหาก และสามารถตกแต่งห้องได้ด้วย

ภาคนี้ตัวละครมีเยอะมากครับ เยอะไม่พอ DLC ก็เยอะตามด้วย ซึ่งตัวละครแต่ละคนจะล้อเลียนมาจากเกมต่างๆ เช่น Lid จาก Solid Snake ซีรี่ย์เกม Metal Gear Solid , Lee-Fi จาก Chun-Li ซีรี่ย์เกม Street Fighter เป็นต้น

[h1]สรุปโดยรวม[/h1]
นับเป็นอีกภาคที่ทำออกมาได้ดี ถึงเกมเพลย์อาจจะไม่เข้มข้นเมื่อไปเปรียบเทียบกับเกมอื่นที่เป็นแบบ Tactical grid map เหมือนกัน แต่ก็ยังคงเล่นได้เพลิดเพลินอยู่สำหรับคนที่ชื่นชอบแนวนี้ สำหรับคนที่ไม่ชอบแนวนี้เลย ผมแนะนำให้ข้ามไปก่อนครับ แต่ถ้ารักซีรี่ย์ Hyperdimension Neptunia ก็จัดไปได้เลยครับ และเป็นที่น่าเสียดายอย่างนึงที่ภาคนี้ FPS ล็อคที่ 30 ตลอดทั้งเกม และไม่มีถ้วย All Achievement อีกทั้งมี DLC เยอะมากที่สุดเมื่อเทียบกับภาคอื่นๆก่อนหน้านี้

[h1]คะแนน 7/10[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198073794838', 'num_games_owned': 450, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1563517949}
review:
Dengekiko:Neptune小姐，你觉得Noire当主角好不好啊？

Neptune：吼啊！

Dengekiko：紫曜之都也支持她吗？

Neptune：当然啦！

Dengekiko：那为什么这么早就决定了，而不考虑别的人选了？

（Neptune正在吃布丁，没有回答）

Dengekiko：白露之滨呢，最近发表了一个报告说呢，紫曜之都会透过一些渠道去影响，干预主角的人选，你对这个看法有什么回应呢？

Neptune：没听到过。

Dengekiko：是你妹妹说的。

Neptune：我妹妹说的就是真的了？你们媒体啊，还是要注意一点，不要“见得风，是得雨”，接到这些消息，你们媒体本身也要判断，明白这意思吗？即使这些完全无中生有的东西，你再帮他们说一遍，你等于——你也有责任吧。

Dengekiko：现在那么早你们就是说支持Noire，会不会给人一种感觉就是内定啊，钦点Noire呢？

Neptune：没任何意思，这还是得按照游戏业界的……按照基本法，按照选举的法去产生……（拿着布丁的左手向前平伸）

Neptune：刚才你问我啊，我可以回答你一句“无可奉告”，你们也不高兴，那怎么办？我讲的意思不是我钦点Noire当下任主角。你问我滋瓷不滋瓷，我是滋瓷的，我就明确地告诉你这一点。

Neptune：你们啊，我感觉你们新闻界还要学习一个。你们非常熟悉游戏业界的这一套理论，你们毕竟还too young.明白我的意思吧？我告诉你们，我是身经百战了，见得多啦！游戏业界的哪一个国家我没去过？你们要知道，绿荫箱庭的Vert，那比你们不知要高到哪里去了，我跟她谈笑风生。所以说媒体呀还是要提高自己的知识水平，识得唔识得啊？唉，我也替你们着急啊，真的。你们有一个好，全世界跑到什么地方，你们比其他的业内记者跑得还快。但是呢问来问的问题呀，都too simple,sometimes naive.懂了没有？

Dengekiko：能不能说一下为什么支持Noire？

Neptune：我很抱歉，我今天是作为一个长者跟你们讲。我不是新闻工作者，但是我见得太多了。我有这个必要好告诉你们一点人生的经验。刚才我很想啊，我每次碰到你和Famitsu，我就讲，紫曜之都有一句话叫“闷声吃布丁”。我什么话也不说，这是坠吼的。但是我想我见到你们这样热情啊，一句话不说也不好。所以刚才你一定要，在宣传上将来如果你们报道上有偏差，你们要负责。我没有说要钦定，没有任何这个意思。但是你一定要问我对Noire支持不支持，我们不支持她？她现在在超次元游戏的死宅粉丝中人气是最高的，我们怎么能不支持人气王？对不对？

Dengekiko：但是如果说当主角呢？

Neptune：当主角也要按照游戏业界的法律啊，对不对？要按照黑土边域的...当然我们的决定权也是很重要的。黑土边域是紫曜之都的铁杆盟友，到那时候我们会表态的。明白这意思吧？你们啊，不要想喜欢弄个大新闻，说现在已经钦定了，就把我批判一番，你们啊 naive！I am angry！你们这样子是不行的，我今天是得罪了你们一下。

review:
本来我是很高兴的，下午回寝室就开始玩，但是由于中途没有存档，三小时后面对游戏突然崩溃的提示，我想我就要死亡。
希望地雷社改进一下优化，少一点套路，多一点诚意。
DLC真的只用买最后4、5个，游戏难度真的不高，没必要买官方外挂。

author: {'steamid': '76561197984211717', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 4074, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1786, 'last_played': 1516661043}
review:
//โปรดใช้จักรยานในการอ่าน เพราะคนเขียนเป็นสาวกของพระแม่ Noire//

เพียงแค่อ่านชื่อ มิตรสหายหลายท่านก็คงพอที่จะเดาได้ว่า Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart นั้นก็คือ Spin-off ของ Hyperdimension Neptunia ที่มีซึนเดเระไร้เพื่อนอย่างพระแม่ Noire เป็นตัวเอก และก็ไม่ใช่เพียงแค่ชื่อและตัวเอกเท่านั้นที่ถูกเปลี่ยน โลกในเกมรวมไปถึงรูปแบบการเล่นก็ถูกปรับเปลี่ยนไปเช่นกัน แต่เพื่อให้ได้ความฟินในอารมณ์ ผมก็อยากจะแนะนำเกมนี้ให้แก่สำหรับผู้ที่เคยสัมผัสกับ Hyperdimension Neptunia มาก่อน เพราะถึงแม้โลกในเกมจะเปลี่ยนไป แต่เนื้อหาสาระของโลกในเกมถูกบอกเล่าในแบบที่ค่อนข้างจะรวบรัดตัดความพอตัว ดังนั้นผู้ที่ไม่เคยได้สัมผัสกับเกมใน Series นี้มาก่อนก็อาจจะได้เงิบเพราะความงงอยู่หน้าจอได้

Hyperdevotion Noire ถือได้ว่าเป็นเกมที่ค่อนข้างจะต่างจากภาคหลักอยู่มากพอตัว สิ่งเดียวที่เกมนี้มีเหมือนกันกับภาคหลักก็คือตัวละครบางตัว (หลัก ๆ ก็คือพระแม่ทั้งสี่และเหล่าตัวประกอบอดทนต่าง ๆ) ที่ได้กลับมาในภาคนี้และตัวเกมยังคงเล่าเรื่องในแบบ Visual Novel เป็นหลัก นอกเหนือจากรายละเอียดเหล่านี้แล้วก็ไม่มีอะไรอีกเลยที่เหมือนกัน Hyperdevotion Noire เป็น Turn-based ที่ตัวละครทั้งหลายถูกย่อส่วนมาในแบบ Chibi-style (หัวโต ตัวเตี้ย ขาสั้น) ดูเผิน ๆ แล้วรูปแบบการเล่นของเกมอาจจะดูเหมือนกลวง แต่ตัวเกมเป็น SRPG ที่มีจุดขายก็คือ Lily System อันเป็นระบบที่ผู้เล่นสามารถใช้ความสัมพันธ์ของเหล่าตัวละครในทีมเพื่อเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการต่อสู้ได้ ซึ่งถ้าคุณชอบ SRPG แบบ Disgaea ในภาคแรก ๆ ก็เป็นไปได้มากว่าคุณจะชอบเกมนี้ด้วย

ในส่วนของตัวละครนั้น ถ้าไม่นับรวมตัวละครหลักซึ่งก็คือตัวคุณเองที่ได้รับบทเป็นเลขาส่วนตัวของพระแม่ Noire และเหล่าเทพธิดาคอนโซลทั้งสี่แล้ว ตัวเกมก็ยังคงมีตัวละครใหม่อีกเพียบให้ได้ใช้ซึ่งส่วนใหญ่เป็นตัวละครที่ถูกทำขึ้นเพื่อล้อเลียนซีรีย์ดังทั้งหลาย เช่น Lid ที่ล้อเลียน Solid Snake, Estelle ที่เป็นตัวละครล้อเลียน Dragon Quest หรือ Ein Al ที่ทำขึ้นเพื่อล้อเลียนเกมในตระกูล Final Fantasy ตัวละครแต่ละตัวล้วนแต่มีอุปนิสัยและเอกลักษณ์รวมไปถึงความสามารถเฉพาะตัว ซึ่งถ้าคุณเป็นคอเกมของฝั่งตะวันออก คุณก็คงจะชอบอกชอบใจอยู่ไม่น้อยเลยทีเดียวกับสาว ๆ สุดโมเอ้ที่คุณจะได้พบในเกม

นอกจากนี้ตัวเกมยังมีระบบที่เรียกว่า Sim Noire ที่คุณจะได้มีโอกาสใช้เวลาอันเป็นส่วนตัวกับพระแม่ Noire ได้อีกด้วย ถ้าจะให้อธิบายโดยย่อ ไอ้เจ้าระบบนี้ก็คือระบบ "จีบ Noire" ก็น่าจะเป็นคำที่เหมาะที่สุดที่จะใช้ล่ะนะ

Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart นับได้เป็น Spin-off ที่ผมแนะนำให้แก่ใครก็ตามที่ชอบเกมในซีรีย์นี้และโดยเฉพาะอย่างยิ่งเหล่าสาวกผู้ชาบูอูราพระแม่ Noire ครับ

คะแนน 8 / 10, 
10 / 10 สำหรับสาวก Hyperdemension Neptunia 
และ 100/10 สำหรับสาวกพระแม่ Noire

ข้อดี:
+ Noire เป็นนางเอก
+ เป็น SRPG ที่มาพร้อมกับ Lily System
+/- ตัวละครแบบ Chibi-style สุดโมเอ้
+ ตัวละครใหม่ในทีมที่ทำขึ้นเพื่อล้อเลียนเกมต่าง ๆ ที่เราต่างก็คุ้นเคยกันดี

ข้อเสีย:
- ณ ขณะเขียนบทความนี้ FPS โดนล็อคที่ 30
- DLCs ชุดใหญ่ที่นับราคารวม ๆ แล้วแพงกว่าเกม (ส่วนตัวผมเองแนะนำให้ซื้อแค่ DLC เพิ่มตัวละคร)
+/- ตัวเอกของเกมคือตัวผู้เล่นเองที่ถูกจับใส่ลงไปในฐานะเลขาส่วนตัวของ Noire

author: {'steamid': '76561198097246351', 'num_games_owned': 1218, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1519965847}
review:
谁他喵的能告诉我一下停止运行该怎么办啊！跟重生3一副尿性，播不出动画就停止运行，不要再告诉我什么买PS3，PSV这种神特喵的解决方法了好吗。
虽然挺期待游戏的，但蹲点蹲到一点，痛快的本体+DLC全入，却不能玩，问解决方法却是买PSV，我整个人内心如同有万匹草泥马在跳踢踏舞，听说有序章后的官方BUG，但我特喵连这官方bug都见不到，因为我压根·进·不·去！
不行，我得淡定，我要去玩会极度恐慌冷静一下，等我吓得湿一裤子，冷静下来，游戏能玩了再重写测评。
--------------------------------------------------------------
已经过去很久了，在买了半年后的某一天，我突发奇想，会不会是集显运行了呢？调好后终于不再闪退了，特么绝了

author: {'steamid': '76561198049638327', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 913, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 913, 'last_played': 1461991044}
review:
Like Fire Emblem? Like Final Fantasy Tactics? Like Turn Based Strategies in general but always found that they were lacking in hot puddingy action? Is the only thing you want more than more than for Nepgear to shut up is for Noire to keep talking? Ever wanted to be Noire's unpaid lackey? Here you go. It's a turn based HDN game and you get what you pay for. Take it now while it's on sale (till May 3rd) or regret it until the summer sale and then forget about it until the day after the summer sale. Your call. As with all the HDN games the DLC is completely optional and you won't EVER use most of it anyways because who doesn't just keep the CPUs in their party?

   *Note that you don't really need prior HDN experience if you are just looking for a turn based strategy as this story does not seem to be in the main storyline (lack of cpu candidates). If you are looking for the "cannon" storyline try HDN2 and HDN3

author: {'steamid': '76561198017391932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1045, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1615034938}
review:
以下是個人主觀評論，無重大捏他。

本作品是Neptunia系列第一款主角換人做做看，由[strike]萬年沒朋友[/strike]的Noire領銜演出。

故事敘述Noire從開場幾近稱霸世界的不可一世態度(沒朋友)，到後來的眾叛親離(沒朋友)，直到遇上男主角後(竟然先交男朋友這...)決心往朋友滿天下的目標前進(Noire有朋友這件事是不是搞錯了什麼?)

遊戲戰鬥方式由以往的RPG變成棋盤式SRPG；並且在遊戲開始前提供三種難度選擇。玩家必須在城市中選擇任務進行挑戰和推進故事。戰鬥畫面中包含各種元素，比如可堆疊的木箱、陷阱等。除此之外也在戰鬥中導入親親模式(無誤)，可以藉此蓄積愛心來發動必殺技，並且增加隊員好感度。另外地形的高低落差也是影響戰鬥的重要因素，不可不慎。有需要者可以在系統設定中開啟簡化戰鬥畫面的功能，節省時間，因為你可能會碰上一場戰鬥就打了快一個小時的狀況。

在城市畫面中可以選擇執行任務、裝飾房間、購買道具、和收編的武將對話等功能，有時間就和收編的武將們聊聊天吧，可以回收故事劇情和CG如果你沒買DLC的話。



優點：
1.可愛的Q版人物造型
2.Noire！(不解釋)
3.精美的事件CG(GGININ)
4.有挑戰性的戰鬥設計
5.Black Heart！(不解釋)
6.遊戲支援4K顯示解析度
7.傲嬌

缺點：
1.血尿般的刷好感度成就地獄
2.DLC...
3.FPS鎖定30
4.女神妹妹都不見啦

什麼人適合玩這款遊戲：
1.黑國信徒
2.黑國教會職員
3.黑國老百姓
4.黑國教會秘書

什麼人不適合玩這款遊戲：
1.紫國信徒
2.綠國信徒
3.白國信徒
4.マジェコンヌ

author: {'steamid': '76561198141401549', 'num_games_owned': 2944, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 2495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2495, 'last_played': 1461767665}
review:
[quote]Good news to Noire fans as our Goddess finally gets her time to shine! This turn-based TRPG spin-off from the Neptunia series deliver in both cuteness and comedy in style.[/quote] 

[h1][u][b]Game Overview[/b][/u][/h1]

[b]Hyperdevotion Noire - Goddess Black Heart[/b] is set in the world of "Gamarket" and is divided into four regions namely Planeptune, Lastation, Lowee, and Leanbox which are overseen by their respective Goddesses (to whom they refer as CPUs). 

The setting is pretty much the same with Hyperdimension Neptunia Series' "Gamindustri", however instead of the people representing [i]game companies[/i], Gamarket's populace is represented with popular games in different kinds of genre (some of them even takes the name of the game itself as character name).

The gameplay focuses on a standard turn-based, tactical rope-playing game (TRPG) melded with the mechanics and features of a Hyperdimension Neptunia series standard. Another similarity to its other games is that the story progression is divided into chapters and can be triggered by clearing the main missions, which will also lead into more character choices for you to choose from.

Not only that, the game also features a dating-simulation mode with the game's main heroine, Lady Noire, in which you as the player becomes a part of the story by taking in the role of a secretary. Progressing this mode isn't that much crucial to the story, but it will yield you more "extra scenes" with the goddess that is a fitting reward by itself.


[h1][u][b]The Pros[/b][/u][/h1]

[list]

    [*][b]Quality Art Design[/b] - The same quality content and art design that IdeaFactory and Compile Heart presents with each of their games are still present in this one. Most of our main heroines' character designs have also been altered to make it more noticeable that it is a spin-off from the original series as well as the game promoting a more [i]cute-ish[/i] approach with their chibi styles, which is pretty much a plus as it wouldn't hurt to have more [i]flavors[/i], wouldn't it?

    [*][b]Great Audio[/b] - Impressive voice overs that is upheld in quality and are both available in English and Japanese versions are still present in the game (which is a big plus for me since I am a big fan of the Japanese Voice overs). The soundtracks and the effects perfectly fits the game's theme and rhythm which is pleasant to the ears. And as always, these tracks are all available for listening in the game's audio menu (which can be found in the CPU Hotel).

    [*][b]Balanced Game Difficulty[/b] - The game has a pretty good curve in terms of difficulty (as long as you don't use stuff from the DLCs which will make the game lesser of an effort to clear, and is clearly aimed for collectors and it's aesthetics) and has toned each of those in their respective aspects. The game might seem simple even on hard mode on the first chapter, but it'll pick up an increasing spike as you progress further into the game.

    [*][b]Tons of Content[/b] - Another aspect that comes back to this spin-off is the quantity of content which contributes to the game's longevity as a whole. You can grind on the side-quests which could help you go unlock items to be "developed" or if you're not much into that, you can focus on the "dating simulator" part of the game with Lady Noire (talking furniture included).

[/list] 


[h1][u][b]The Cons[/b][/u][/h1]

[list]

    [*][b]Repetitive Gameplay[/b] - While there are many other things that you can do besides the classic grinding, progressing through battle mode (missions) is the one that you can't help but repeat many times since the dating simulator mode requires you to at least finish a mission before proceeding with new content, and the same with collecting items and recipes to unlock certain goods. And even if they spice it up with some additions, the goal to reach the end is mostly the same for each mission.

    [*][b]Capped Frame Rate[/b] - Most of the time, the reason to why gamers prefer buying the PC version of games is because it mainly offers superior graphics and/or smoother gameplay that is delivered by having the game perform at 60 FPS (Frames per second), however this game has it capped at 30 FPS which is the same thing that the consoles have, which could've been at least tweaked for the PC port release.

    [*][b]Game Bugs[/b] - Me and my friend who recently bought the game had some troubles with the game's fullscreen mode when alt-tabbing/escaping (though it might not be that much of a deal since the game works perfectly and most of the time, the preferred mode is borderless, this is just to cover all bases). My issue is that the game crashes when I do the alt-tabs and my friend reported me that it makes the game revert to a windowed screen mode after alt-tabbing. [b]UPDATE:[/b] So far, most likely due to nature of a PS Vita Port, the quick save can only be used ONCE and cannot be overwritten nor deleted. 

[/list] 


[h1][u][b]The Verdict[/b][/u][/h1]

For long time fans, I think I don't even need to say it for them to [b]get the game[/b]. 
And for those who are new to the franchise, I can pretty much guarantee that this game is worth the value (especially with that 40% cut right off the bat!).

[quote]If you like to see more recommended games that is worth the value you are paying, please visit my other [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/rankmenotplz/recommended/]reviews[/url], or follow our curator group at [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/GoodGamesGR#curation]Good Games Giveaways & Reviews[/url].[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198062939900', 'num_games_owned': 392, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 2804, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1787, 'last_played': 1691893742}
review:
在凌晨等了半小时终于开卖了当然第一时间就买了
玩了第一章后，有个小感想:这回又是一个外传，跟本篇毫无关联
由于是诺瓦露为主角，所以涅普顿有点抱打不平(没法子啦，因为在Re;Bitrh3那里希子说之前的人气投票第一名是诺瓦露嘛，所以…)
有图有真相：
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=577407223
而且有史以来有男主（就是玩家自己）
而这回类型是策略类(对，找回以前的玩天使帝国的时候)，还蕴含一些养成元素，而且人设是Chibi风格这绝对是比较少见的
对于DLC的方面，由于太多DLC，所以我给来的建议是买角色DLC就可以了(IF、Compa、Sting（←这个是本游戏制作的工作室的名字）还有妖精剑士F的提亚拉(Tiara))

PS：能否把《神次元偶像海王星PP》也出在Steam上吗？（恳求脸）
=============================================
5月5日 更新：
首先恭喜《新次元游戏海王星V2》夏季登陆Steam！（其实去年ESRB就曝光出来，我就猜今年夏季推出，结果就不用说了，官方今天（5月5日）就正式公布了）

通关感想：
虽然目前只通了一般结局，感觉很不错，因为是策略类所以比较烧脑
画面真的要吐槽一下，这回居然是强制1080P（如果低于1080P的话，Steam截图后有黑边），希望官方能够修复一下这个问题
图片（我已经窗口化了并且拉到最大了， 但还有黑边）：
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=674383934
帧率其实没啥问题30帧也可以了
剧情的话世界观是游戏市场界（不同于游戏业界）而出现了事故后玩家遇上诺瓦露就成了命运的邂逅，玩家也成了诺瓦露的秘书官，之后你们自己发掘吧，啊对了，敌人还是那位熟悉的玛大婶
其实标题可以叫《诺瓦露与她的22位后宫》（手动doge脸）
当然吐槽依然：DLC很多，买了之后发觉是外挂（不过特别推荐买DLC角色），还有成就也是地狱（特别是百合度）
到最后——啥都不说了，既然海王星V2已经确定推出Steam版了，何时把《神次元偶像海王星PP》也出在Steam上吗？（真的，想玩这个，想把涅普顿成为真正的民那的偶像）

author: {'steamid': '76561198046562545', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 108, 'playtime_forever': 1120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 757, 'last_played': 1464753101}
review:
I'll start with the cons, as they're pretty short and minor.

Cons:
- NO NEPGEAR (Or any of the other CPU Candidates)
- 30 FPS Lock (Not that big a deal since it's a strategy game, but still a slight negative for me)
- Sound issues; the music does not loop well so it'll just restart abruptly in the middle of basically anything
- Due to its chibi-style, in-game graphics are rather weak. Charming, but could've been a lot better. And like all other Neptunia games, assets are recycled hard.
- Not sure if it's just me, but for some reason I don't get achievement notifications until I exited out of the game and got a bunch at once.
- Slighty annoying controls; they're pretty standard, but some things are just a little annoying and I'll detail them a little more below.

Problems I have with control scheme (using an xbox 360 controller, I don't know about keyboard controls):
[list]
[*] During the battle setup, you can only go through enemy units based on a list. Can't freely move around and check stuff yourself.
[*] Buff/debuff information not readily available; need to press B on a character to see it
[*] The left analog stick is used to control the camera (as are the LB and RB buttons for 90 degree intervals), and the right stick is used to control the zoom. This would've been much nicer having LB/RB control zoom, and right stick control camera.
[*] While the game will tell you, this is nice to know earlier: You can slightly affect the path your unit takes by changing its orientation before moving (X on gamepad)
[/list]

That's all I find wrong with the game.

Pros:
+ Gameplay is fun (like a weaker fire emblem, sorry that's the only other grid-based strategy game I've played so it's the only comparison I can make). Mechanics are all explained when necessary and are not difficult to understand and remember.
+ Incentive to buy stuff from the shop with the "Noire's Room" simulation thing. Since the game is Noire focused, the global "EVENT!" things from the previous games are all focused around Noire now.
+ The characters so far are fun and cute. The CPUs have the same personality as their other games so no surprises there.
+ They have replayable missions with rewards that change from the first time you beat them, giving you a reason to do it again (and a way to grind up any characters who may have lagged behind)
+ Same charm and humor as the other games.

I would recommend the game. It's a lot better than the other spin off on steam, Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed. That said, do remember that this is a strategy game. It may not be to your liking. If that's the case, remember you can refund it within a week if your playtime is under 2 hours.

And since some of you might be confused by the DLC, it's all pretty much just OP items, not necessary at all.
The only exceptions are: "Ultimate Event Full Unlock", which unlocks all gallery items (I'm like 80% sure you can unlock them all in-game anyway, this is just a shortcut), and the four bonus characters: Tiara from Fairy Fencer, IF and Compa from the main games, and Sting, who is just a DLC-original character for this game (I looked it up to verify). I would consider those 4 characters to be the only DLC worth getting, don't bother with any of the gear packs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078329875', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1472580679}
review:
[i][b]butter[/b][/i]: "I'm tired of this. I'm done with the Neptunia series. I love anime, and I like your art style, but the quality is just not there. You guys aren't even trying anymore. The jokes are stale and character development is non-existent. The dialogue runs in circles of anime cliches to nowhere, directing a plot that could've been dreamed up by a bored horny 6th grader in history class learning about the American revoluton for the 500th time, which, incidentally, is not a bad analogue for how it feels to play these games now. The combat has no depth and no balance; or, honestly, it has some potential, but you guys do nothing with the mechanics at all. It feels like I'm repetitively using unecessarily and meaninglessly long combos to hit really sturdy cardboard cutouts. 

I only thing I look forward to now is the animation for a new super attack or whatever. Ugh....okay, and some of the fanservice scenes are okay too.

I'm sorry, but it's over. Our honeymoon wasn't too shabby, but there's nothing left in this relationship. It's not me; it's you."

[b][i]Idea Factory[/i][/b]: "We published another game."

[b][i]butter[/i][/b]: "I told you. I don't care anymore. I didn't even buy that stupid action game you guys made because it looked so braindead."

[b][i]Idea Factory[/i][/b]: "But this one is a turn-based strategy RPG."

[b][i]butter[/i][/b]: "Uh, yeah, like your first game, and your second.....look, are you trying to piss me off? You're not going to have -

[b][i]Idea Factory[/i][/b]: (interrupting) "- This one is different. It has obvious squares and the associated mechanics, more like Disgaea or Fire Emblem or Advanced Wars."

[b][i]butter[/i][/b]: "You think comparing yourself with other games I like will make me take you back? I-i-it's not like you've piqued my interest or anything.....b-b-baka."

[b][i]Idea Factory[/i][/b]: "It uses a lot more chibi."

[b][i]butter[/i][/b]: "...That's not even a good thing."

[b][i]Idea Factory[/i][/b]: "There's a lot of new characters."

[b][i]butter[/i][/b]: "Sigh....aren't they just gonna be more 1-dimensional tropey characters? You guys don't even build on the 100 characters that you already have."

[b][i]Idea Factory[/i][/b]: "Noire is the main character."

[b][i]butter[/i][/b]: "........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................I hate you."

[b][i]Idea Factory[/i][/b]: "Heehee, so does that mean you'll buy this one? I know you can afford it."

[b][i]butter[/i][/b]: "Sh-shut up."

author: {'steamid': '76561198068621843', 'num_games_owned': 418, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 4362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1533512497}
review:
очередной спин-офф серии Hyperdimension выпущенный на пк.
Всем внимание, перед нами Noire: Goddess Black Heart история рассказывающая об одной из CPU. 
Сюжет как обычно не слишком замысловат, но не боясь экспеременитровать мы видим непревычный для серии жанр.
Тактическая, пошаговая игра с Чиби стилистикой. Выбираем задание, берем напарников и вперед на нашу так сказать шахматную доску, мне еще не повидались сложные задания, но надеюсь в дальнейшем будет, что-то из разряда: "каждый твой ход может стоить мисии".  Гора текста в повседневных болтаниях никуда не девается и большую часть времени мы также будем кликать кнопку на геймпаде/левую кнопку мыши и пытаться понять как на свое родном, о чем же там говорят. 
Также немного по другому тут устроен лвл ап, он повышается прямо в бою, после всей "партии" мы можем увидеть не последнего кто убил врага,а аж "MVP" и знать, кто приносит вклад из кучки девиц и ещеее мы аж комнату можем обустроить.
Не так много мне удалось повидать еще в игре, но однозначно реализация интересная, не без дыр, но хороша. 
Также в этой игре предоставлено очень много персонажей которых раньше мы и не видели (и не какие-то "левые" проходимцы, а как и приемлемо серии, каждая героиня явлется отсылкой к чему либо).
Также можно испугаться DLC листа, лично мой совет, не стоит брать их все. Ультимейт сетами лишь сломаете себе игру, не знаю как насчет персонажей (говорят тоже сверх сильные поначалу, но вот их я только и купил). У меня все.

我们没有办法，拿着游戏和DLC抵工资！
原价88的游戏我们只要52，原价179的DLC统统只要125！
125，只要125！125你吃不了亏125你上不了当！
（后略
[spoiler]地雷社你们也知道DLC这么贵啊[/spoiler]
==========

首先声明，冲着诺瓦露这好评我点了

玩了1天以后发现的若干毛病：
前面写的太明白了，52的游戏125的DLC，直接改名叫HyperDLCension得了

说好的支持手柄呢？？？？？？（请善用JoyToKey和scpserver
按F12截图会变成这个鬼样子
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=673920556  
NO AUTO BUTTON AND NO SKIP BUTTON（只能使用高桥名人连打来跳过英文
翻译一直是地雷社水准，这个玩过其他几作的都懂（已经比KONMAI QUALITY更加牛逼了）

总结：冲着诺瓦露老子他妈忍了还好评了，但地雷社不是人，我们辛辛苦苦攒了那么多信仰钱，你居然给我看这个，你还我血汗钱，还我血汗钱！！！
